Verses: 1 karththarudaiya Vaarththai Enakku Undaagi, Avar:
2 manupuththirane, Nee Erusalemin Aruvaruppugalai Adharku Ariviththu Sollavendiyadhu Ennavendraal:
3 karththaraagiya Aandavar Erusalemukku Sollugiraar, Kaanaan Dhesame Un Urpaththikkum Un Pirappukkum Idam, Un Thagappan Emoriyan, Un Thaai Eththiththi.
4 un Pirappin Varththamaanam Ennavendraal, Nee Pirandha Naalile Un Thoppul Arukkappadavumillai; Nee Suththamaavadharkuth Thanneerinaal Kulippaattappadavumillai; Thunigalil Sutrappadavumillai.
5 unakkaagap Paridhabiththu, Ivaigalil Ondraiyaagilum Unakku Seyya Oru Kannum Unperil Irakkamaayirundhadhumillai; Nee Pirandhanaalil Nee Aruvarukkappattadhinaal Veliyil Erindhuvidappattaai.

6 naan Un Aruge Kadandhupogum Podhu, Midhikkappaduvadharku Edhuvaai Nee Un Raththaththil Kidakkiradhaik Kandu, Un Raththaththil Kidakkira Unnaippaarththu: Pizhaiththiru Endren; Aam, Un Raththaththil Kidakkira Unnaippaarththu: Pizhaiththiru Endru Sonnen.

7 unnai Vayalin Payiraippola Anegamaayiramaaip Perugumpadi Vaiththen; Nee Valarndhu Periyavalaagi, Magaa Sowndhariyavadhiyaanaai; Un Sthanangal Ezhumbina, Un Mayir Valarndhadhu; Aanaalum, Nee Nirvaanamum Ammanamumaayirundhaai.

8 naan Un Aruge Kadandhupona Podhu, Unnaip Paarththen; Idho, Un Kaalam Paruvakaalamaayirundhadhu; Appozhudhu En Vasthiraththai Unmel Viriththu, Un Nirvaanaththai Moodi, Unakku Aanaiyittukkoduththu, Unnodu Udanpadikkai Panninen Endru Karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiraar; Ivvidhamaai Nee Ennudaiyavalaanaai.
9 naan Unnai Jalaththinaal Muzhukkaatti, Unnai Raththamara Snaanam Pannuviththu, Unakku Enney Poosi,
10 siththiraththaiyalaadaiyai Unakku Uduththi, Saayantheerndha Paadharatchaigalai Unakkuth Thariththu, Katta Melliya Pudavaiyaiyum, Moodikkollap Pattu Saalvaiyaiyum Unakkuk Koduththu,
11 unnai Aabaranangalaal Alangariththu, Un Kaigalile Kadagangalaiyum, Un Kazhuththile Sarappaniyaiyum Pottu,
12 un Netriyil Netrippattaththaiyum, Un Kaadhugalil Kaadhaniyaiyum, Un Thalaiyinmel Singaaramaana Kreedaththaiyum Thariththen.

13 ivvidhamaaip Ponninaalum Velliyinaalum Nee Alangarikkappattaai; Un Uduppu Melliya Pudavaiyum Pattum Siththiraththaiyalaadaiyumaayirundhadhu; Melliya Maavaiyum Thenaiyum Neyyaiyum Saappittaai; Nee Migavum Azhagullavalaagi, Raajyaththai Sudhandharikkum Silaakkiyaththaiyum Petraai.
14 un Azhaginaale Un Keerththi Pura Jaadhigalukkulle Prasiththamaayitru; Naan Unmel Vaiththa En Magimaiyinaale Adhu Kuraivatradhaai Irundhadhendru Karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiraar.
15 neeyovendraal Un Azhagai Nambi, Un Keerththiyinaal Soramaarkkamaai Nadandhu, Vazhippokkaril Unakku Nerpatta Yaavarodum Vesiththanampanni,

16 un Vasthirangalil Silavatrai Eduththu, Palavaruna Jodippaana Medaigalai Unakku Undaakki, Avaigalinmel Vesiththanampanninaai; Appadikkoththa Kaariyangal Orukkaalum Sambaviththadhumillai, Sambavippadhumillai.
17 naan Unakkuk Koduththa En Ponnum En Velliyumaana Un Singaara Aabaranangalai Nee Eduththu, Unakku Aansuroobangalai Undaakki, Avaigalode Vesiththanampanni,
18 un Siththiraththaiyalaadaigalai Eduththu, Avaigalai Moodi, En Enneyaiyum En Thoobavarkkaththaiyum Avaigalinmun Padaiththu,

19 naan Unakkuk Koduththa En Appaththaiyum, Nee Saappidumpadi Unakkuk Koduththa Melliya Maavaiyum Neyyaiyum Thenaiyum Nee Avaigalinmun Sugandhavaasanaiyaagap Padaiththaai; Kaariyam Ippadi Aayitrendru Karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiraar.
20 nee Enakkup Petra Un Kumaararaiyum Un Kumaaraththigalaiyum Eduththu, Avargalai Avaigalukku Iraiyaagap Paliyittaai.
21 nee Seydha Vesiththanangal Podhaadhendru, Nee En Pillaigalai Avaigalukkuth Theekkadakkappanna Oppukkoduththu, Avargalaik Kolaiseydhaai.

22 nee Un Ellaa Aruvaruppugalilum Vesiththanangalilum Nadakkumpodhu, Nirvaanamum Ammanamumaayirundhadhum, Un Raththaththile Midhikkappada Edhuvaaikkidandhadhumaana Un Siruvayadhin Naatkalai Ninaiyaamarponaai.
23 aiyo! Unakku Aiyo! Endru Karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiraar; Nee Seydha Pollaappukkalellaam Thavira,
24 nee Unakku Mandabangalaik Katti, Unakku Sagala Veedhigalilum Uyarndha Medaigalai Undupanninaai.
25 nee Sagala Vazhimuganaiyilum Un Uyarndha Medaigalaik Katti, Un Azhagai Aruvaruppaakki, Vazhippokkar Yaavarukkum Un Kaalgalai Viriththu, Un Vesiththanangalaith Thiralaaip Perugappanni,
26 sadhai Peruththa Un Ayal Dhesaththaaraagiya Egipthiya Puththirarode Vesiththanampanni, Enakkuk Kobam Undaakkumpadi Un Vesiththanangalaip Perugappanninaai.

27 aadhalaal, Idho, Naan En Kaiyai Unakku Virodhamaaga Neetti, Unakku Niyamiththa Pojanaththaik Kurukki, Un Muraikedaana Maarkkaththaik Kuriththu Vetkappatta Un Pagaiyaaligalaagiya Pelistharudaiya Kumaaraththigalin Ichchaikku Unnai Oppukkoduththen.
28 nee Thirupthiyadaiyaadhadhinaal Aseeriya Puththirarodum Vesiththanampanninaai; Avargalode Vesiththanampanniyum Nee Thirupthiyadaiyavillai.
29 nee Kaanaan Dhesaththile Seydha Vesiththanaththai Kaldheyarmattum Etta Seydhaai; Adhinaalum Nee Thirupthiyadaiyaamarponaai.
30 vetkanketta Vesiyin Kiriyaigalaagiya Ivaigalaiyellaam Nee Seydhu,

31 sagala Vazhimuganaiyilum Un Mandabangalaik Katti, Sagala Veedhigalilum Un Medaigalai Undaakkinapadiyaal, Un Irudhayam Evvalavaaik Kalaiththuppoyirukkiradhu Endru Karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiraar; Nee Panaiyaththai Alatchiyampannugiradhinaal, Nee Vesiyaippola Iraamal,
32 than Purushanukkup Padhilaaga Anniyarai Serththukkollugira Vibasaara Sthreeyaippola Irukkiraai.

33 ellaa Vesigalukkum Panaiyankodukkiraargal; Neeyo Un Nesargal Sutruppurangalilirundhu Unnidaththil Vesiththanancheyya Varumpadi Avargalukkellaam Neeye Panaiyankoduththu, Avargalukku Vegumadhigalaith Tharugiraai.

34 ivvidhamaai Un Vesiththanangalukkum Vere Sthreegalin Vesiththanangalukkum Viththiyaasamundu; Vesiththanampanna Avargal Unnai Pin Sellamaattaargal; Panaiyam Unakkuk Kodukkappadaamal Neeye Panaiyam Kodukkirapadiyaal Nee Seyvadhu Vibareedham.
35 aagaiyaal, Vesiye, Karththarudaiya Vaarththaiyaik Kel.

36 karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal: Un Vesiththanaththin Asuththam Paaindhapadiyinaalum, Nee Un Kaamavigaarigalodum Aruvaruppaagiya Un Naragalaana Vikkiragangalodum Vesiththanampanni, Ivaigalukku Un Pillaigalin Raththaththaip Padaiththadhinaal Un Nirvaanam Thirakkappattapadiyinaalum,

37 idho, Nee Sampogampannina Un Ellaak Kaamavigaarigalaiyum, Nee Nesiththa Yaavaraiyum, Nee Pagaiththirukkira Anaivarodum Naan Koodivarachcheydhu, Sutrilumirundhu Avargalai Unakku Virodhamaaga Serththu, Avargal Un Nirvaanaththaiyellaam Kaanumpadi Un Nirvaanaththai Avargalukku Munbaagath Thirandhuvaiththu,
38 vibasaarigalaiyum Raththanchindhinavargalaiyum Nyaayantheerkkirapadiye Unnai Nyaayantheerththu, Ukkiragaththodum Erichchalodum Raththappazhiyai Unperil Sumaththi,

39 unnai Avargal Kaiyil Oppukkoduppen; Avargal Un Mandabangalai Idiththu, Un Medaigalaith Tharaiyaakkippottu, Un Vasthirangalai Urindhu, Un Singaara Aabaranangalai Eduththukkondu, Unnai Ammanamum Nirvaanamumaaga Vittuppoi,
40 unakku Virodhamaaga Oru Koottaththaik Konduvandhu, Unnaik Kallerindhu, Unnaith Thangal Pattayangalaal Kuththipottu,
41 un Veedugalai Akkiniyaal Sutteriththu, Anega Sthreegalin Kangalukku Munbaaga Unnil Nyaayaththeerppugalai Seyvaargal; Un Vesiththanaththai Ozhiyappannuven; Nee Inip Panaiyankoduppadhillai.
42 ivvidhamaai En Erichchal Unnai Vittu Neengumpadi Naan En Ukkiraththai Unnil Aarappanni, Ini Kobamaayiraamal Amaruven.

43 nee Un Ilavayadhin Naatkalai Ninaiyaamal, Ivaigalellaavatrinaalum Enakkuk Kobam Undaakkinapadiyinaal, Idho, Naan Un Vazhiyin Palanai Un Thalaiyinmel Sumarappannuven Endru Karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiraar; Adhinaale Ini Un Ellaa Aruvaruppugalinaalum Ippadippatta Muraikedaana Kaariyaththai Seyyamaattaai.
44 idho, Pazhamozhi Sollugiravargal Ellaarum: Thaayaippola Magal Endru Unnaikkuriththu Pazhamozhi Solluvaargal.

45 nee, Than Purushanaiyum Than Pillaigalaiyum Aruvaruththa Un Thaayin Magal; Nee, Thangal Purusharaiyum Thangal Pillaigalaiyum Aruvaruththa Un Sagodharigalin Sagodhari; Ungal Thaai Eththiththi; Ungal Thagappan Emoriyan.
46 un Idadhupuraththile, Thaanum Than Kumaaraththigalumaaik Kudiyirundha Samaariyaa Un Thamakkai; Un Valadhupuraththile, Thaanum Than Kumaaraththigalumaaik Kudiyirundha Sodhom Un Thangai.

47 aagilum Nee Avargaludaiya Maarkkangalile Nadavaamalum, Avargaludaiya Aruvaruppugalinpadi Seyyaamalum, Adhu Magaa Arpakaariyam Engiradhupola Nee Un Ellaa Vazhigalileyum Avargalaip Paarkkilum Kedaai Nadandhaai.
48 neeyum Un Kumaaraththigalum Seydhadhu Pola, Un Sagodhariyaagiya Sodhomum Avaludaiya Kumaaraththigalum Seyyavillai Endru En Jeevanaikkondu Sollugiren Endru Karththaraagiya Aandavar Uraikkiraar.

49 idho, Gervamum, Aagaarath Thiratchiyum, Nirvisaaramaana Saangobaangamumaagiya Ivaigale Un Sagodhariyaana Sodhomin Akkiramam; Ivaigale Avalidaththilum Aval Kumaaraththigalidaththilum Irundhana; Sirumaiyum Elimaiyumaanavanudaiya Kaiyai Aval Balappaduththavillai.
50 avargal Thangalai Uyarththi, En Mugaththukku Munbaaga Aruvaruppaanadhai Seydhaargal; Adhai Naan Kandapodhu, Avargalai Ozhiththuvitten.

51 nee Seydha Paavangalil Araivaasiyum Samaariyaa Seyyavillai; Nee Un Sagodharigalaippaarkkilum Unpaavangalaip Perugappanni, Nee Seydha Un Ellaa Aruvaruppugalinaalum Avargalai Needhiyullavargalendru Vilangappanninaai.

52 ippodhum Un Sagodharigalaik Kutravaaligal Endru Theerththa Nee Avargalaippaarkkilum Aruvaruppaaga Seydha Un Paavangalinimiththam Un Lachchaiyai Sumandhukol; Unnaip Paarkkilum Avargal Needhiyullavargal; Un Sagodharigalai Needhiyullavargalendru Vilangappannina Nee Vetkamadaindhu, Un Lachchaiyai Sumandhukol.

53 naan Sodhomum Aval Kumaaraththigalum Siraiyirukkira Avargaludaiya Siraiyiruppaiyum, Samaariyaavum Aval Kumaaraththigalum Siraiyirukkira Siraiyiruppaiyum Thiruppumpodhu, Avargal Naduvil Nee Siraiyirukkira Unnudaiya Siraiyiruppaiyum Thiruppuven.
54 adhinaal Nee Avargalukku Aarudhalaaga Irundhu, Un Lachchaiyai Sumandhu; Nee Seydha Ellaavatrinaalum Vetkamadaivaai.

55 un Sagodharigalaagiya Sodhomum Aval Kumaaraththigalum Thangal Mundhina Seerukkuth Thirumbuvaargal; Samaariyaavum Aval Kumaaraththigalum Thangal Mundhina Seerukkuth Thirumbuvaargal; Neeyum Un Kumaaraththigalum Ungal Mundhina Seerukkuth Thirumbuveergal.
56 unnai Verukkum Seeriyaavin Kumaaraththigalum, Avalai Sutrilum Irukkira Pelistharin Kumaaraththigalum Avamaanam Panninapodhu Un Pollaappu Veliyaayitre.
57 adharkumun Un Gervaththin Naalile Un Sagodhariyaagiya Sodhomin Peyarai Un Vaayinaale Uchcharikkavumaattaai.
58 un Muraikettaiyum Un Aruvaruppugalaiyum Nee Sumappaai Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.
59 karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal: Udanpadikkaiyai Muriththupodugiradhinaal Aanaiyai Asattaipannina Nee Seydhadhupola Naan Unakkum Seyven.
60 aagilum Un Ilavayadhil Unnode Pannina En Udanpadikkaiyai Naan Ninaiththu, Niththiya Udanpadikkaiyai Unakku Erpaduththuven.

61 appozhudhu Un Thamakkaigalaiyum Un Thangaigalaiyum Nee Serththukkollugaiyil, Un Vazhigalai Ninaiththu Naanuvaai; Avargalai Naan Unakkuk Kumaaraththigalaagak Koduppen; Unnudaiya Udanpadikkaiyaip Paarththuk Koduppadhillai.
62 unnode En Udanpadikkaiyaippanni Erpaduththuven; Appozhudhu Naan Karththar Endru Arivaai.
63 nee Seydha Ellaavatraiyum Naan Manniththarulumpodhu, Nee Ninaiththu Vetki, Un Naanaththinaal Un Vaayai Inith Thirakkamaattaadhiruppaai Endru Karththaraagiya Aandavar Uraikkiraar Endru Sol Endraar.
